data.comment: Today's referee, Jair Marrufo, has blown to start the match.
Today's referee, Jair Marrufo, has blown to start the match.
Aleksandar Katai (LA Galaxy) has hit the post with a header.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Houston.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Boniek Garcia for Houston gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a LA Galaxy goal kick.
In Houston a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Houston.
Houston awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Houston in their own half.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in the half of Houston.
Ball safe as Houston is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Houston at BBVA Compass Stadium.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Houston in their own half.
Free kick for Houston in the half of LA Galaxy.
LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
Houston are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
LA Galaxy's Chicharito misses with an attempt on goal.
Jair Marrufo awards Houston a goal kick.
Cristian Pavon puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
David Bingham instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Houston close to the penalty box.
Free kick in a good position for Houston!
Houston have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Houston drive upfield and Maynor Figueroa gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a LA Galaxy defender.
Houston have a dangerous throw-in.
Jair Marrufo signals a throw-in for Houston, close to LA Galaxy's area.
Can Houston capitalize from this throw-in deep inside LA Galaxy's half?
Houston's Tommy McNamara breaks free at BBVA Compass Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Houston.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in their own half.
LA Galaxy's Aleksandar Katai gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Houston at BBVA Compass Stadium.
Houston's Mauro Manotas is on target but unsuccessful.
Houston awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for LA Galaxy in Houston.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to LA Galaxy just outside Houston's area.
Nick DePuy (LA Galaxy) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Houston awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to LA Galaxy in their own half.
LA Galaxy to take a throw-in in Houston territory.
Free kick LA Galaxy.
Goal kick for LA Galaxy at BBVA Compass Stadium.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to LA Galaxy in their own half.
LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
Can Houston get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in LA Galaxy's half?
Throw-in LA Galaxy.
In Houston a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jair Marrufo awards the away team a throw-in.
In Houston Houston attack through Memo Rodriguez. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a LA Galaxy goal kick.
Boniek Garcia of Houston gets in a strike, but is off target.
Jair Marrufo awards LA Galaxy a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Houston.
Jair Marrufo signals a Houston throw-in in LA Galaxy's half.
Free kick Houston.
Can Houston get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in LA Galaxy's half?
Throw-in for Houston in the half of LA Galaxy.
Maynor Figueroa for Houston gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a LA Galaxy goal kick.
Houston's Boniek Garcia breaks free at BBVA Compass Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Houston.
LA Galaxy are caught offside.
Jair Marrufo blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Houston to take a throw-in in LA Galaxy territory.
LA Galaxy are pushing forward but Aleksandar Katai's finish is wide of the goal.
Jair Marrufo awards Houston a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Houston.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to LA Galaxy.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in the half of Houston.
Boniek Garcia for Houston has been booked by Jair Marrufo and receives a first yellow card.
In Houston a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Aleksandar Katai (LA Galaxy) gets a yellow card.
Goal kick for LA Galaxy at BBVA Compass Stadium.
Houston have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Mauro Manotas.
Great play from Zarek Valentin to set up the goal.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in the half of Houston.
Houston needs to be cautious. LA Galaxy have an attacking throw-in.
In Houston Houston attack through Mauro Manotas. The finish is off target, however.
LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
Tommy McNamara (Houston) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Houston.
Houston have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Kiki Struna (Houston) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for LA Galaxy at BBVA Compass Stadium.
Guillermo Schelotto is making the team's first substitution at BBVA Compass Stadium with Joe Corona replacing Aleksandar Katai.
Can Houston get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in LA Galaxy's half?
Ball safe as Houston is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Marko Maric for Houston who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Marko Maric returns to the field for Houston after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in the half of Houston.
Joe Corona (LA Galaxy) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
LA Galaxy's Joe Corona gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Houston have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Houston in their own half.
Can Houston capitalize from this throw-in deep inside LA Galaxy's half?
Jair Marrufo awards LA Galaxy a goal kick.
Christian Ramirez is replacing Tomas Martinez for Houston at BBVA Compass Stadium.
LA Galaxy have a dangerous throw-in.
Sebastian Lletget of LA Galaxy smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Boniek Garcia is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
It seems as if Boniek Garcia is unable to continue. Niko Hansen replaces him for the home team.
LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Houston awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Houston.
Ball goes out of play for a Houston goal kick.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in their own half.
LA Galaxy awarded a throw-in in their own half.
LA Galaxy drives forward and [47] gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy close to the penalty box.
